prompt: Their story begins on a bright summer morning when they both awake in bed together with no memory of who they are or where they came from.

She is determined to go on an epic road trip this summer. When her best friend bails out at the last minute, she talks one of her co-workers into joining her as a reluctant sidekick for the adventure of a lifetime.
Write a story where one character finds the other character in their tent while camping alone.
